title: LambdaCapturingClasses not supported in GraalVM 21.3
body:
### Describe the bug

https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/commit/b772ad2dec4c8734f2bde3dd607fa7490b5e29cf introduced `LambdaCapturingTypeBuildItem` which depends on `org.graalvm.nativeimage.impl.RuntimeSerializationSupport#registerLambdaCapturingClass` which was introduced in GraalVM 22.1.0 (https://github.com/oracle/graal/commit/b455f23b624a1af149c7d5769443a4775bedd087).

### Expected behavior

Integration test `main` should pass when using GraalVM 21.3.

### Actual behavior

Integration test `main` fails when using GraalVM 21.3 with:

```
[quarkus-integration-test-main-999-SNAPSHOT-runner:57]    classlist:   7,120.24 ms,  1.69 GB
[quarkus-integration-test-main-999-SNAPSHOT-runner:57]        (cap):     780.38 ms,  1.69 GB

```

### How to Reproduce?

```
./mvnw clean -Dnative -pl integration-tests/main -Dquarkus.native.builder-image=quay.io/quarkus/ubi-quarkus-mandrel:21.3-java11 -Dnative.surefire.skip -Dformat.skip -Dno-descriptor-tests package -Dquarkus.native.container-build=true
```

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

11.0.16+8

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

21.3.3.0-Final

### Quarkus version or git rev

https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/28529

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

_No response_

### Additional information

_No response_
